title: Kissed on Platial
name: Kissed on Platial
description:
A Map by Deisnor

A compilation of kisses I found on Platial. Feel free to add your own smooches and tingles.

properties.name: Ahh...first kiss
properties.description: Posted by Johngaltwhere my wife and I first kissed...well worth the wait

properties.name: Avenue B and 1st
properties.description: Posted by Janedoe Avenue B and 1st SE corner , NY, NY

properties.description: Posted by Baostar 600 E Bay Ave., Balboa, CA 92661

properties.name: Be Careful What You Wish For
properties.description: Posted by Gueneviva  her boyfriend dared me to try to kiss her

properties.name: Boston Common Smooches
properties.description: Posted by Tebor 300 Tremont St, Boston, MA 02111If you can distract her away from staring at the sky, this is a great place to kiss Lisa.

properties.name: First kiss
properties.description: Posted by Carodeluxewinthrop,METhe pointer places it in the middle of a lake, because there\'s no specific "address." Unfortunately, it wasn\'t quite that exciting. Ah, to be 14 again.

properties.name: He was Bomberos, a Portuguese Firefighter.
properties.description: Posted by Paiges We would spend hours driving around the winding narrow streets between the tiny old villages south of Lisbon where you grew up and still live. You drove like a demon, cutting corners at 50 miles an hour, and wildly swerving around old grandmothers walking slowly across streets in front of the car. You were my only companion for the two months I lived in Portugal. We met each night but never once spoke on the phone. I hated your driving, hated the way you drove fast and furious making me cry and hide in my seat. You loved to scare me. Laughing good naturedly at my terror until I cried and then pulling the car over. You would mumble a thousand apologies, kiss my hands and face and repeat the word for "Joke" over and over while stifling giggles. It was a nightly ritual, I would sit all day reading by myself and wait for you to get off of work and then we would drive aimlessly. There was nowhere to be and no one to care what we did. I couldn\'t speak a lick of Portuguese and you spoke no English at all. For two months we talked with our hands, our bodies, our eyes and our kisses.

properties.name: I helped you move and then I kissed you....
properties.description: Posted by Felinekittykat kenoza ave,01832You started as my student, became my best friend and I fell in love with you. Only, you didn\'t know. That is, you didn\'t know until you told me you wished you could kiss me, so I kissed you. You\'re beautiful.

properties.name: Lamplight Kiss
properties.description: Posted by Yeweleed Panera BreadIt wasn\'t our first, but it was the best of our early ones. Innocently leaning towards you, wondering whether you were going to lean back. In the darkness, illuminated only by a streetlamp, we repaid the gods for the tawdriness of the mid-stage suburban mall development we were consecrating.

properties.name: My early teen years
properties.description: Posted by Felinekittykat liberty st, 49770I had my first kiss with a boy here. I wasn\'t thrilled, but it was what was expected of me. I grew up here from ages of 11 to 16.

properties.name: Skateland - First Kiss
properties.description: Posted by Ultrasonik  3103 Old Airport Rd 44691Had my first kiss back in the good olde days of Wooster Skateland

properties.name: Where I found love and was a spectacle
properties.description: Posted by Euro My boyfriend and I went here on our second date. This was the first time we really kissed, the first time I allowed myself to be openly gay in public. And this old asian woman walked by and exclaimed, "It\'s two men!"

properties.name: Where I kissed her and fell in love
properties.description: Posted by Jtoews

properties.name: Where I went to Elem & Middle School.  My first kiss was behind the bandstand with Tonya West!
properties.description: Posted by Happy62780 Caledonia High SchoolA lot of memories here!
